blog.description: RIP LEELAH. Hi there! I'm Sophie, a 23 year old from England. Feminist, aspiring author and general optimist...I'm a fan of a lot of things okay?

summary: I hate that people are taking how wonderful Captain Marvel is to put down Black Widow. Can we just love and appreciate different...
body: I hate that people are taking how wonderful Captain Marvel is to put down Black Widow. Can we just love and appreciate different characters? It doesn’t have to be a competition. And nobody did that with, I don’t know, iron man and Thor.

reblog.comment: I hate that people are taking how wonderful Captain Marvel is to put down Black Widow. Can we just love and appreciate different characters? It doesn’t have to be a competition. And nobody did that with, I don’t know, iron man and Thor.

trail.content_raw: I hate that people are taking how wonderful Captain Marvel is to put down Black Widow. Can we just love and appreciate different characters? It doesn’t have to be a competition. And nobody did that with, I don’t know, iron man and Thor.

blog.name: winter-soldatt
blog.title: vanessa
blog.description: ◦fanfiction writer ◦ she/her ◦ 15 ◦ marvel ◦ body guard ◦ message me! ◦ I take requests ◦

summary: When You Were Sick • Avengers Preferences 4
body:
When You Were Sick • Avengers Preferences 4

Tony

-Being the only father figure to you, he’d try and take of you as much as possible.

-he’d get you anything you like

-he stay with you until you fell asleep, if you weren’t already asleep.

-he’d turn on Doc McStuffins, because that was your favourite show when you were sick.

-when you were better he’d give you whatever you want still, and take you out to lunch to eat like never before.

Steve

-he’d worry about you constantly when on missions without you

-he’d vent, or miss shots at enemies over his worries for you.

-once he got back, he squeeze you like it was the last time he’d see you.

-he’d protest when he had to leave you, even though he loved fighting crime and being all justified.

-once he left he’d phone you frantically in the quinjet.

-the signal would break up and he’d get flustered and worried

-everyone would have to calm him down and remind him that you just had a cold and that you were alright.

-once you were better, he’d treat you to whatever you liked.

Bruce

-he’d talk to Natasha about all the different illnesses you could have out of pure panic

-Natasha would have to calm him down as he’d go as far as cancer, and cystic fibrosis.

-he’d come in and check on you frantically, and anytime the nurses said he couldn’t he’d bring out the green guy, restricting him from you even longer.

-when he could, he’d slip a little remedy medicine in your tea, to get you better faster.

-when you were better,  he’d go on and on about how worried he was and how many things he thought you could have, even though all you had was the flu.

Thor

-he’d demand everyone to leave you but him

*even loki*

- he’d stay with you no matter what. He’d eat what you ate so you didn’t feel left out, and sleep in the same bed as you, even though your sick *i mean he’s a god so*

-once you got better, he’d let everyone visit you, even Loki.

Loki *I KNOW HE ISN’T A AVENGER BUT LEMME MOURN*

-He’d be more flustered than ever

-More mischievous to Thor

-He’d be constantly trying to find ways to get you better, even resulting to magically remixes, but the nurses always rejected them.

-you’d tell him you’d be fine but he never believed you, he just acted like he did to make you feel better.

-if Thor even took a step in the hallway with anything that he thought wouldn’t be healthy to he around you, he’d stop him, and if Thor didn’t comply it was total drama warfare.

-once you were better, he’d cuddle you until your arms cramped.

T'Challa

-he’d be frantically asking shuri to produce something that could make you better fast even if you only had a cold, and were already getting better.

-he’d refuse to go on missions that weren’t as upper scale in the threat rate until you were better.

-his team would have to pull him out of your room to make him go, as he was truly worried some kind of foreign animal had bitten you in Nigeria, or you were pricked by something, anything to stay with you he made it up,

-he worked himself up about it all the time

-when he came back, he’d demand some kind of test to make sure you were alright, no matter what.

-when you were better you’d joke about how panicked he was for a simple cold.

Bucky [Sickness is worse ex. Coma,]

-He’d work himself up about it as you were in the OR

-when the results came back, he’d freeze and frantically go on about how it’s not possible.

-Steve would comfort him about it.

-you’d be unconscious, but somehow aware of his presence when he came in.

-he’d talk to you about how much he loves you, and how you’d pull through, that he knew it.

-if the doctors tried to remove him from the room, he’d get all protective. Seeing how he had a metal arm, they’d back off.

-when the doctors had to move you, he be right there beside you, comforting you.

-when your coma deepened, he was depressed. It had been weeks and you hadn’t pulled through.

-tony suggested that they turn off life support, that you were hanging in a thread and you’d be memory less.

-Bucky pinned him to a wall when he suggested it.

-eventually you’d pull through and he’d be happier than ever.

-you’d remember somethings, but especially Bucky.

blog.name: valentinecult
blog.title: Welcome to my blog.
blog.description: I'm simply a tumblr user that has an interest in many fictional verses. I normally talk about Blazblue, Guilty Gear--well many video games in general that interest me. Movies I enjoy is the Marvel Cinematic Universe. :D Huge fan of characters like Doctor Strange, Black Panther, and Iron Man. I'm pretty much open to anything. Originally heavily Guilty Gear-themed, but I changed it to expand myself on this site. In case you're wondering about the character all over my blog, her name is Ramlethal Valentine. Don't mind her, I just...love her. :3

summary: Is there anyone more powerful than Thanos with the gauntlet?
question: Is there anyone more powerful than Thanos with the gauntlet?
answer:
Currently right now, no one stands much of a chance. But Doctor Strange is shown to be able to counter some the Gauntlet’s attacks, which implies Doctor Strange could potentially match or equal the Gauntlet since he himself has similar abilities of the stones.

Assuming the theory of him faking his death is true, Doctor Strange could be somewhere else improving his magic. But if we want to take it outside the MCU, that would be the One Above All…or the Living Tribunal. Those guys are the real GODS of Marvel and are superior than the Infinity Stones.

reblog.comment:
Currently right now, no one stands much of a chance. But Doctor Strange is shown to be able to counter some the Gauntlet’s attacks, which implies Doctor Strange could potentially match or equal the Gauntlet since he himself has similar abilities of the stones.

Assuming the theory of him faking his death is true, Doctor Strange could be somewhere else improving his magic. But if we want to take it outside the MCU, that would be the One Above All…or the Living Tribunal. Those guys are the real GODS of Marvel and are superior than the Infinity Stones.

trail.content_raw:
Currently right now, no one stands much of a chance. But Doctor Strange is shown to be able to counter some the Gauntlet’s attacks, which implies Doctor Strange could potentially match or equal the Gauntlet since he himself has similar abilities of the stones.

Assuming the theory of him faking his death is true, Doctor Strange could be somewhere else improving his magic. But if we want to take it outside the MCU, that would be the One Above All…or the Living Tribunal. Those guys are the real GODS of Marvel and are superior than the Infinity Stones.
trail.content:
Currently right now, no one stands much of a chance. But Doctor Strange is shown to be able to counter some the Gauntlet’s attacks, which implies Doctor Strange could potentially match or equal the Gauntlet since he himself has similar abilities of the stones.

Assuming the theory of him faking his death is true, Doctor Strange could be somewhere else improving his magic. But if we want to take it outside the MCU, that would be the One Above All…or the Living Tribunal. Those guys are the real GODS of Marvel and are superior than the Infinity Stones.

blog.name: scavengingforwords
blog.title:
Fandom!
(largely Marvel Fandom)
blog.description: I'm a nerd who gets sucked into tons of fandoms, here is where I will gather my fandom love. Let’s be honest though, at this point this is like 99.99% Marvel and of that percentage 99% of it is Avengers Academy related.

blog.name: assassinprocrastinator
blog.title: Never tell me the odds ⎊
blog.description: Assassin Procrastinator / 21 / Europe / Multifandom / Professional fangirl and shiper. / Nobody ever saw me living a real life. / "On va voir."

summary: It's weird to say that Infinity War was a great movie, cause like sure, it was lit? But all of my favs died or suffered?? So it...
body: It’s weird to say that Infinity War was a great movie, cause like sure, it was lit? But all of my favs died or suffered?? So it kinda sucked? But in like a good way?? Like -100/10, but would let it destroy my emotions again???

reblog.comment: It’s weird to say that Infinity War was a great movie, cause like sure, it was lit? But all of my favs died or suffered?? So it kinda sucked? But in like a good way?? Like -100/10, but would let it destroy my emotions again???

trail.content_raw: It’s weird to say that Infinity War was a great movie, cause like sure, it was lit? But all of my favs died or suffered?? So it kinda sucked? But in like a good way?? Like -100/10, but would let it destroy my emotions again???
trail.content: It’s weird to say that Infinity War was a great movie, cause like sure, it was lit? But all of my favs died or suffered?? So it kinda sucked? But in like a good way?? Like -100/10, but would let it destroy my emotions again???

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: the night we met
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CqHWJw

by beyondmythoughts

Over the years Steve had fallen in love with simplicity, the continuous beats of a song, the coordinated stepping coming from a couple’s practically Intertwined feet at they smittenly walk towards the sunset.

But oh, how he did love a surprise.

[ idea and plot credit: LilianHearts on youtube. check them out! ]

[ title credit: lord huron ]

blog.name: thesplintering
blog.title: The Splintering
blog.description: Pop culture & entertainment news. Try not to have fun. This is supposed to be informative.

summary: Comic store owner "Perch" reflects on the industry's February sales numbers
title: Comic store owner "Perch" reflects on the industry's February sales numbers
body:
Comic store owner “Perch” reflects on the industry’s February sales numbers

A lot of folks like to make hay out of comic book sales numbers every time new information is released. One of the more objective & insightful voices commenting on the comic book industry is Perch, an anonymous comic book shop owner who has appeared on several social media channels including the Larry King and Alterna Comics YouTube channels.

Below are Perch’s thoughts on the comic industry’s…

View On WordPress
